title: What are the advantages and benefits of interdisciplinary studies? - Quora

response.answer_text: The advantages and benefits of interdisciplinary studies are penned below. A) The life that we are leading is largely due to the interdisciplinary http://research.Be it ICT, Medical wonders , taming the hunger or enduring sustainability for arresting the environmental changes reflected in climate change besides arresting the inching of planet towards the tipping point! B) All the “subjects” which are being taught were brought into existence by the persons who had never studied those subjects themselves .Thanks to those persons who explored the new possibilities by breaking the frame in which they were indoctrinated. The analogy that we take from this is only one—- the interdisciplinary study ! C) Harvard Business Review had reported the research sometime in July-August [ probably in 2012] that if one “ wants to keep his team creative and innovative; one should keep people from humanities background also” and not only engineers and scientists in R & D. This research is instilling the fact that we have to be interdisciplinary in our thoughts . It is not only depicting the importance of “ perfect understanding,actionable knowledge and total awareness of one field besides being specialist of one particular field”,which make a person more valuable for life,society and human race; but also delineates the critical importance of interdisciplinary studies! C) Modern algorithms like “deep learning” reduced the cost and time required for “collated data”! Interdisciplinary learning gave us “pace makers” for saving lives or dialysis in health care in addition to various equipments required in precision surgery. Alexa and Siri use interdisciplinary inputs for becoming so much useful for Homo Sapiens could become Homo Deus courtesy the scholars who came together from various domains and through interdisciplinary studies and research undertaken by them. Robocall is now part of daily life for GPS, typing out letters, responding “lifelike” nursing requirement for elderly and assisted living could be possible because of interdisciplinary approach of hyperspecialists from across various disciplines of human endeavors. D)Natural Language Processing’s needs are fulfilled by specialists from the most varied disciplines of linguistics,neuroscience and Artificial Intelligence.Shortly, we will become one planet,one nation facilitated by Crypto currency, augmented reality and seamless communication across languages — all because of interdisciplinary studies!!!

Interdisciplinary study allows students to build their own pathway of education by choosing courses which make sense to them. For example, a student can prepare a theme which crosses over various disciplinary boundaries in commerce, technology, music, art etc. and study a curriculum developed as per his own choice. Studying this way would result in more meaningful learning and would help them to bring various ideas together.In this way, their learning is deepened, in addition to the following benefits: Students are motivated as they are pursuing their own interests which would result in better learning and connecting it to the real world. Ultimately the process of higher education becomes smoother, purposeful and meaningful for the students.Interdisciplinary education produces better output as this learning experience will stay with the students for their lifetime.The interdisciplinary approach helps students in developing critical thinking skills, which helps them enormously in their personal and professional life.Students learn to compare and built concepts across various subject areas.The interdisciplinary study helps students to pursue new knowledge of different subject areas.Interdisciplinary knowledge and application of different disciplines would lead to greater creativity and ultimately to overall development.Quantum University, Roorkee is one among the few universities in India that offers interdisciplinary education.
